title: Honey Mustard Aioli
description: Balanced and sharp honey mustard aioli perfect for chicken, sandwiches, or as a dipping sauce
ingredients: Pinch of garlic powder or fresh minced garlic
Tiny squeeze of lemon juice (Â½ tsp, since your chicken already has lemon)
instructions: In a small bowl, combine Greek yogurt (or mayo) and Dijon mustard.
Add honey and whisk until smooth.
Add garlic powder (or fresh minced garlic) and mix well.
Add a tiny squeeze of lemon juice and stir to combine.
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days.
notes: This aioli is perfect for chicken dishes, especially when the chicken already has lemon. The Greek yogurt version is lighter, while mayo gives it a richer taste. Adjust honey and mustard ratios to your preference - more honey for sweetness, more mustard for sharpness.
